title: Strawberry Vodka Shot

ingredients.content: 600 g strawberries, frozen, hulled, quartered (see tip)

preparations.content: Place sugar in mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add frozen strawberries and water then chop <b>40 sec/speed 5<b> <b>-10, increasing speed gradually<b> while stirring with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula. Insert measuring cup then chop again <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add lemon juice and vodka then mix <b>30 sec/speed 6<b>. Pour into sterilised glass bottles and store in fridge until required. Serve chilled.

hintsAndTricks: For easy blending, freeze strawberries as individual pieces; quarter strawberries then spread out pieces on a tray and freeze. Once frozen, use frozen fruit in recipe or transfer to a freezer bag for later use.
<b>Instead of lemon juice use lime juice, or a mix of both.
Try with other frozen berries or frozen fruits.
Add sparkling water, to taste, to make it a 'longer' drink.
